awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Geometry and Analysis on CR Manifolds
awd_abstract_narration: John Lee will continue his studies of Cauchy Riemann                       manifolds. He will investigate the ways in which certain                        curvature and torsion tensors on a pseudohermitian manifold can                 be simplified by appropriate choice of CR structure and contact                 form.                                                                                The principal problems to be considered are 1) the CR Yamabe               problem which asks for a contact form with constant scalar                      curvature; 2) to choose a contact form for which the Webster                    Ricci tensor is a scalar multiple of the Levi form; 3) to                       determine which CR manifolds admit contact forms satisfying both                previous conditions; 4) to determine conditions under cwhich the                CR structure can be varied to achieve vanishing torsion and                     constant scalar curvature.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
